data.eml:eml: First record and a new species of the fossil dragonfly genus Proinogomphus (Odonata: Liassogomphidae) from the Early Jurassic of Bascharage in the Grand Duchy of Luxembourg

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Bechly, Günter (2018): First record and a new species of the fossil dragonfly genus Proinogomphus (Odonata: Liassogomphidae) from the Early Jurassic of Bascharage in the Grand Duchy of Luxembourg. Zootaxa 4450 (1): 108-114, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4450.1.7
